name: devsuite
description: Una suite integral de herramientas para desarrolladores y creativos, diseñada para ser rápida, intuitiva y estéticamente agradable.

scripts.prepare-public: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); if (fs.existsSync('public')) fs.rmSync('public', { recursive: true, force: true }); fs.mkdirSync('public/dist', { recursive: true }); fs.mkdirSync('public/icons', { recursive: true }); fs.copyFileSync('index.html', 'public/index.html'); fs.copyFileSync('manifest.json', 'public/manifest.json'); fs.copyFileSync('service-worker.js', 'public/service-worker.js'); fs.writeFileSync('public/robots.txt', 'User-agent: *\nAllow: /\nSitemap: https://dev-suite.vercel.app/sitemap.xml'); fs.writeFileSync('public/sitemap.xml', '<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"UTF-8\"?><urlset xmlns=\"http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9\">  <url>    <loc>https://dev-suite.vercel.app/</loc>    <lastmod>' + new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0] + '</lastmod>    <changefreq>weekly</changefreq>    <priority>1.0</priority>  </url></urlset>'); try { fs.cpSync('icons', 'public/icons', { recursive: true }); } catch (e) {} "
scripts.dev: npm run prepare-public && npm run build:css && esbuild index.tsx --bundle --splitting --format=esm --outdir=public/dist --servedir=public --port=8000 & npm run watch:css
scripts.build: npm run prepare-public && npm run build:css && esbuild index.tsx --bundle --splitting --format=esm --outdir=public/dist --minify --jsx=automatic
